author: arizzi
body:
With this the reference to prunedParticles contained in the packedGen is set to the same-particle-in-pruned when available.
The behaviour of the accessors is the same and should be backward compatible.

This will allow a better merging of pruned+packed in downstream processing (e.g. for Rivet ParticleLevel producer) and avoid exact matching on pt  as done in:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/GeneratorInterface/RivetInterface/plugins/MergedGenParticleProducer.cc#L44

@gpetruc @perrozzi @intrepid42
title: MiniAOD: change motherRef in packed Candidate
